Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Neutropenia |
| Maturation arrest of the myeloid series |

Explanation:

* Neutropenia is a condition characterized by a decreased number of neutrophils in the blood.
* Maturation arrest of the myeloid series is a condition where the maturation process of myeloid cells is halted, leading to the presence of immature cells in the blood instead of mature ones.
